item.title: Video Editor for TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor who can turn our raw footage into captivating TikTok videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of TikTok trends and editing techniques to create visually stunning and attention-grabbing content. As a video editor, you will be responsible for trimming, cropping, and enhancing videos, adding effects, transitions, and text overlays to make them stand out. You should also have a good sense of timing and storytelling to ensure the videos flow smoothly and engage viewers.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Knowledge of TikTok trends and editing techniques
  - Attention to detail and ability to work with tight deadlines

  This is a small-sized project with an undetermined length of time. We are looking for an expert-level video editor who can deliver high-quality TikTok videos that capture our audience's attention and drive engagement on a daily basis.  

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 23, 2024 12:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor with Interest in Generative AI - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, here is what we're looking for:

Job Description:

We're seeking an enthusiastic video editor with a keen interest in generative AI, particularly Midjourney. This role is perfect for someone looking to gain further experience in combining video editing skills with emerging AI technology to create engaging content.

Responsibilities:

- Edit and produce videos for various platforms under supervision
- Learn to incorporate Midjourney-generated images into video - projects
- Assist in brainstorming creative concepts using AI tools
- Help maintain a consistent style across video content
- Develop skills in both video editing and AI-assisted content creation

Requirements:

- Intermediate knowledge of video editing.
- A genuine interest in Midjourney or other generative AI tools.
- Familiarity with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Creative mindset and eagerness to learn.
- Good communication skills.
- Portfolio or samples of video editing work (even if from personal or academic projects).

Nice to Have:

- Some experience with Midjourney or similar AI tools.
- An intermediate understanding of motion graphics.
- Familiarity with social media platforms.

Project Scope:

This is an intermediate-level position with opportunities for growth going forward and a chance for more regular work.
Please do 3 * 8 to qualify, call me Mr. AIE when submitting your application, and tell me one interesting fact about yourself.

* More details can be given during the interview stage, as well as the channel being shown.
Applicants who submit a showreel as part of this process will be favored over those who don't.

Thanks,

Vay

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 12:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Education, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Education, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Creative Video Editor for 2nd Medical YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Overview:
We are a prominent medical YouTube channel seeking a skilled and creative video editor to join our team for our second channel. Our main channel has been active since 2017, focusing on presenter-driven, piece-to-camera content. As we expand, we need a talented editor to create engaging long-form videos and YouTube shorts.

Selection Process:
We will initially select 4-5 video editors to create 1 long-form YouTube video (2-4 minutes) with high-click-through engaging thumbnail and 1 YouTube short (30-60 seconds) per week. The editor who best meets our criteria for creativity, quality, and adherence to deadlines will be chosen for a long-term collaboration.

Note: This position offers the opportunity for a long-term working relationship, with the selected editor expected to produce 52 long-form videos and 52 YouTube shorts annually long-term. For each deliverable—1 long-form YouTube video (2-4 minutes) with a high-click-through engaging thumbnail and 1 YouTube short (30-60 seconds)—we offer payment of $80 per week long-term.

Responsibilities:
• Edit and render 1 long-form YouTube video (2-4 minutes) with high-click-through engaging thumbnail and 1 YouTube short (30-60 seconds) per week.
• Perform post-production tasks including color grading, audio enhancement, and adding text, sound effects, images, transitions, and B-roll footage.
• Create high-click-through video thumbnails for each long-form video.
• Add on-screen subtitles (CC text) for YouTube shorts.

Creative Expectations:
• Enhancing Viewer Retention: It's crucial to captivate and retain viewer interest throughout the video. Utilize creative elements such as:
- Text Overlays: Highlight key points, emphasize important information, or pose questions to encourage viewer interaction.
- Sound Effects: Integrate appropriate sounds to enhance the atmosphere and reinforce the content's message.
- Images: Select relevant visuals that visually support the presenter's discussion.
- Fun Transitions: Use creative transitions to maintain visual interest and enhance flow.
- Title Screens: Design compelling title screens that introduce each video effectively.
- B-roll Footage: Find and incorporate high-quality B-roll footage that aligns with the topics discussed. We will not specify which footage to use; this is up to your creative judgment.

• Creativity and Autonomy: Editors are encouraged to showcase their creativity and take ownership of the editing process. You have the freedom to explore different creative approaches and innovate within the video content framework. We value originality; however if you are looking for a good example of editing that we like for you to draw inspiration from here is an example from Dr Mike's channel on YouTube that we like - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vpyGyKct4Us

Efficiency Expectation:
• Our current editor on the main channel completes 1 long-form video with a thumbnail and 1 YouTube short in less than an hour. While we value efficiency, quality remains paramount, and we expect you to deliver polished content that meets our standards consistently.

Requirements:
• Proven experience in video editing, preferably in a similar genre.
Ability to work autonomously, meet deadlines, and deliver high-quality content consistently.
• Strong attention to detail and a keen eye for visual storytelling.
Proficiency in editing software and tools necessary for high-quality video production.

What We Provide:
• High-quality 4K footage for each scene of the long-form videos, supplied as individual files for efficient editing.
• Video scripts for guidance on content structure and order.
• 24/7 availability for questions and support during the editing process.

Budget: $80
Posted On: June 23, 2024 11:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Editor Wanted to Take Long-Form YT Videos into Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
I am a YouTube content creator, posting long-form fishing videos. Many have titles like "Top 5 Fishing Spots" and I'm looking for an editor to take my already edited videos and turn them into multiple short-form videos for social media purposes. The editing needed is basic to intermediate, as each long-form video will be turned into shortened clips with a similar style.

Turnaround time varies, but a minimum of two short-form videos per week is acceptable. I can provide the uploaded video from YouTube, the original videos, related pictures, etc.

REQUIRED SKILLS: Looking for an editor who can add some graphics and animations to grab the audience's attention. Social media experience is preferable.

Job Description: Edit one (1) video into five (5) short videos for $50.

This job will start here, and could potentially turn into editing the long-form content in the future, if desired. Thanks!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 23, 2024 11:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, YouTube
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing, YouTube
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UG video content - woman 50+ - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a talented creator to shoot 3 engaging and authentic User-Generated videos (for use mainly on Tiktok, Meta) showcasing the positive impact of our menopause relief supplement for women.

Project Requirements:
Create 3 unique UG videos (each approximately 1-2 minutes long) featuring real women sharing their experiences with our menopause supplement.
Videos should be filmed in a natural, well-lit setting.
Each video should focus on a specific benefit of the supplement (e.g., reduced hot flashes, improved sleep quality, increased energy levels).
Women in the videos should be relatable and authentically discuss their experiences with menopause and how the supplement has helped them.
The creator is required to transfer all rights to the video to our company. The video may be used for generating both paid and organic traffic to our digital product assets.
Native US English
We are open to creative ideas for the video format!

Please submit your proposal, experience with UG videos, and relevant samples of your work.
State your project rate.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 11:24 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, English, Testimonial Video, Video Ad
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, English, Testimonial Video, Video Ad
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Video Editor For Youtube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an editor to edit shark and bear attack videos.

I will provide a compilation of footage that has shark attacks.

You will need to place these onto the narration which is already chopped and edited.

No music or sound effects are needed.

You must also search for relevant footage to use based on what the narrator is saying. These should be all found by searching on youtube, no stock footage should be used.

Will need to have a new clip every sentence of the narration at a minimum. All video clips must match as best as possible what the narrator is saying in that particular sentence.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 23, 2024 11:16 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Canada
